column4: what is the difference between fsck and e2fsck ? is the second one just for ext2 ?
what is the difference between fsck and e2fsck ? is the second one just for ext2 ?
yes; fsck is the generic name. there is fsck.jfs e2fsck fsck.xfs etc ...
see the e2fsck man page... i think that passing -cc toi it will check for badblocks ... but double check docs to not loose data
